flavorText: The odds are good, but the goods are odd.
name: Oddly Uneven
originalText:
Choose one —
• Destroy each creature with an odd number of words in its name. (Hyphenated words are one word.)
• Destroy each creature with an even number of words in its name.

rulings.text: Include all words in the name, including lowercase words like “of” or “the.”
The name of a creature token is the same as its creature type(s), unless the effect that created it gives it a specific name. For example, a Human Soldier creature token is named “Human Soldier.”

text:
